diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $5$ units.
The length of the line $OB$ is $21.5$ units.
The length of the line $OC$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $AC$ is $15$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $B$.
The line connecting $O$ and $C$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $C$ and $A$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AO$, and $BC$, forming the triangle $OAB$.
The lines $OB$ and $OC$ are the sides of the triangle $OAB$.
